notes.text:
An update is available for module.rubygem-abrt, rubygem-mysql2, module.rubygem-pg, ruby, module.rubygem-mysql2, rubygem-abrt, module.ruby, rubygem-pg.
This update affects Rocky Linux 8.
A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE list
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
Ruby is an extensible, interpreted, object-oriented, scripting language. It has features to process text files and to perform system management tasks.

Security Fix(es):

* ruby: RCE vulnerability with .rdoc_options in RDoc (CVE-2024-27281)
* ruby: Buffer overread vulnerability in StringIO (CVE-2024-27280)
* ruby: Arbitrary memory address read vulnerability with Regex search (CVE-2024-27282)

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.10 Release Notes linked from the References section.

This advisory is provided by Ctrl IQ, Inc for Rocky Linux systems. For more information about CIQ security practices, visit https://ciq.com/security.
notes.title: Description

references.summary: Red Hat CSAF document for RHSA-2024:3546

document.title: Moderate: ruby:3.1 security, bug fix, and enhancement update
